Index entries for sequences related to Nim-sums
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (2,-1,0,0,0,0,0,-1,2,-1).
formula: a(n) = n + 8(-1)^[n/8]. - Mitchell Harris, Jan 10 2005G.f.: (8-7*x-8*x^8+9*x^9) / ((1-x)^2*(1+x^8)). - _Colin Barker_, Apr 12 2016a(n) = n XOR 8. - _Michel Marcus_, Apr 12 2016
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
